trans-unit.source: Represents a variable-length stream of binary data to be stored in or retrieved from a database.
trans-unit.target: 表示二进制数据存储中或从数据库中检索的变量长度流。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure, setting the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*> property to the contents of the supplied byte array.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>结构，设置<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*>属性提供的字节数组的内容。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The byte array to be stored or retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 要存储或检索的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: Concatenates two specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> values to create a new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 串联两个指定<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>值，以创建一个新<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: `x` will appear first in the resulting <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary>, followed by `y`.
trans-unit.target: `x`将在随后出现第一个显示<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary>后, 跟`y`。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> that is the concatenated value of x and y.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"> </xref> x 的串联的值和 y。

trans-unit.source: Compares this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> object to the supplied <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> object and returns an indication of their relative values.
trans-unit.target: 比较此<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>对象与所提供<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>对象并返回对其相对值的指示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> object to be compared to this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"> </xref>对象要进行比较这<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: A signed number that indicates the relative values of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure and the object.
trans-unit.target: 一个带符号的数字，它指示此相对值<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>结构和对象。

trans-unit.source: Return value
Condition
Less than zero
The value of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> object is less than the object.
trans-unit.target: 此值<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>对象是小于的对象。

trans-unit.source: Zero
This <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> object is the same as object.
Greater than zero
This <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> object is greater than object.
-or- The object is a null reference.
Compares this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> object to the supplied object and returns an indication of their relative values.
trans-unit.target: 比较此<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>与提供的对象的对象并返回对其相对值的指示。

trans-unit.source: The object to be compared to this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 要对此进行比较的对象<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: A signed number that indicates the relative values of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure and the object.
trans-unit.target: 一个带符号的数字，它指示此相对值<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>结构和对象。

trans-unit.source: Return value
Condition
Less than zero
The value of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> object is less than the object.
trans-unit.target: 此值<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>对象是小于的对象。

trans-unit.source: Zero
This <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> object is the same as object.
Greater than zero
This <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> object is greater than object.
-or- The object is a null reference.
Concatenates two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structures to create a new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 串联两个<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>结构，以创建一个新<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
The concatenated values of the x and y parameters.
trans-unit.target: 串连的值 x 和 y 参数。

trans-unit.source: Compares the supplied object parameter to the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*> property of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将提供的对象参数<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*>属性<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The object to be compared.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if object is an instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> and the two are equal; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果对象的实例<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>和两种方法是相等; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structures to determine whether they are equal.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>结构，以确定它们是否相等。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two values are equal.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果两个值相等。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
If either instance is null, then the <xref uid="langword_csharp_SqlBinary" name="SqlBinary" href=""></xref> will be null.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一实例为 null，则<xref uid="langword_csharp_SqlBinary" name="SqlBinary" href=""></xref>将为 null。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位有符号的整数哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that indicates the XSD of the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> ，该值指示指定的 XSD <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structures to determine whether the first is greater than the second.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>结构，以确定第一个是否大于第二个。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> if the first instance is greater than the second instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"> </xref>即<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>如果第一个实例大于第二个实例。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>.

If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Compares two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structures to determine whether the first is greater than or equal to the second.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>结构，以确定第一个是否大于或等于第二个。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> if the first instance is greater than or equal to the second instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"> </xref>即<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>的第一个实例是否大于或等于第二个实例。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>.

If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Indicates whether this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure is null.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否这<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>结构为 null。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
For more information, see [Handling Null Values](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理 Null 值](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the single byte from the property located at the position indicated by the integer parameter, index.
trans-unit.target: 获取从单字节属性位于由整数参数指示的位置 index 。

trans-unit.source: If index indicates a position beyond the end of the byte array, a will be raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果 index 指示超出末尾的字节数组中，位置将引发。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.

To avoid raising a <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlNullValueException>, always examine the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A> property and the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Length%2A> property before reading this property.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免引发<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlNullValueException>，始终检查<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A>属性和<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Length%2A>之前读取此属性的属性。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Length%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlNullValueException>

trans-unit.source: The position of the byte to be retrieved.
The byte located at the position indicated by the integer parameter.
trans-unit.target: 位于由整数参数指示的位置中的字节。

trans-unit.source: Gets the length in bytes of the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取用字节表示的长度<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*>属性。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
To avoid raising a <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlNullValueException>, always examine the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A> property before reading the Length property.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免引发<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlNullValueException>，始终检查<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A>然后才能读取 Length 属性的属性。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlNullValueException>

trans-unit.source: The length of the binary data in the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的二进制数据的长度<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*>属性。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The Length property is read when the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*> property contains <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Null"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 长度属性为只读时<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*>属性包含<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Null"> </xref>。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structures to determine whether the first is less than the second.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>结构，以确定第一个是否小于第二个。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> if the first instance is less than the second instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"> </xref>即<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>如果第一个实例小于第二个实例。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>.

If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Compares two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structures to determine whether the first is less than or equal to the second.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>结构，以确定第一个是否小于或等于第二个。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> if the first instance is less than or equal to the second instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"> </xref>即<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>如果第一个实例小于或等于第二个实例。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>.

If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Compares two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structures to determine whether they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>结构，以确定它们是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.

A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are not equal or <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"> </xref>即<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>如果两个实例是否不相等或<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>如果两个实例是否相等。

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Represents a <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref> that can be assigned to this instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 表示<xref href="System.DBNull"> </xref> ，可以将其分配到此实例的<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: `Null` functions as a constant for the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary> structure.
For more information, see [Handling Null Values](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理 Null 值](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Compares two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structures to determine whether the first is less than or equal to the second.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>结构，以确定第一个是否小于或等于第二个。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> object.

trans-unit.target: 将此转换<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>为 string 的对象。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref>. If the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Value*> is null the string will contain "null".
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含<> *1> 的<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"> </xref>。如果<> *1> 为的 null 的字符串将包含"null"。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
This property is read-only.
To avoid raising a SqlNullValueException, always examine the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A> property before reading the Value property.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免引发 SqlNullValueException，始终检查<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A>然后才能读取 Value 属性的属性。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.IsNull%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary"></xref> structure.
The Value property is read when the property contains <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Null"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值属性为只读时的属性包含<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary.Null"> </xref>。
